author: ogel3001
title: Snow Queen.
review:
This set is very nice apart from the fact that the sleigh breaks.

Pros

  • Horse with wings.
  • Real clothing.
  • Tree with snow on it.
  • Rabbit with skates.
  • Rare large trans-purple snowflake.

Cons

  • The sleigh breaks a LOT.
  • Strange gem display inside the rock.

I think this set is pretty good apart from the fact that it breaks.
